caption:
Table 1. Image-text retrieval results on Flickr30K and MSCOCO datasets (zero-shot and fine-tuned). ALIGN is compared with Image-
BERT (Qi et al., 2020), UNITER (Chen et al., 2020c), CLIP (Radford et al., 2021), GPO (Chen et al., 2020a), ERNIE-ViL (Yu et al.,  2020), VILLA (Gan et al., 2020), and Oscar (Li et al., 2020).
Table 5. VTAB (19 tasks) comparison between ALIGN and BiT-L.

Table 6. Transfer learning results on Fine-grained Classifica-
tion Tasks. BiT-L (Kolesnikov et al., 2020) was trained with 
ResNet152 x 4 whereas SAM-baseline, SAM-final (Foret et al., 
2021) and ALIGN were trained with EfficientNet-L2.
Table 7. Comparison between ALIGN-B7 and ALIGN-L2.
